assetProfile.address2: Life Science Park Road Haidian District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Beijing Originwater Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the water and wastewater treatment industry in China and internationally. The company is involved in environmental protection engineering design; investment, construction, and operation of urban water supply and sewage treatment projects; technical consultation; and reuse of reclaimed water. Its products and technologies include microfiltration membrane, ultrafiltration membrane, ultra-low pressure selective nanofiltration membrane, and reverse osmosis, as well as high-performance low-energy membrane bioreactor, double-membrane new water source process, double-membrane new water source process, and other membrane-integrated urban sewage deep purification technologies. The company engages in municipal sewage and industrial wastewater treatment, tap water treatment, seawater desalination, civil water purification, wetland protection and reconstruction, sponge city construction, river comprehensive treatment, black and odorous water body treatment, municipal landscape construction, urban light environment construction, solid waste and hazardous waste treatment, environmental monitoring, ecological agriculture, and circular economy. Beijing Originwater Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
